articles.author: Gabriel Gavin, Victor Jack
articles.title: Russia’s Lukoil to sell off foreign assets as US sanctions bite - politico.eu
articles.description: Restrictions imposed by Washington will force the company to end its exports to European countries.
articles.content: A former Lukoil executive, granted anonymity to speak freely, said the move could see the companys revenues and profits plummet by about 30 percent, as it is forced it to sell three refineries and ar… [+1842 chars]
